description.english: Complete the tutorial and choose the Syndicate faction OR become honored with the Syndicate as Outis Background.
description.russian: Завершите обучение и выберите Синдикат ИЛИ заслужите уважение «Синдиката» с предысторией «Никто».
description.brazilian: Complete o tutorial e escolha a facção PMC OU torne-se honrado com o PMC com Histórico Outis.

description.english: Complete the tutorial and choose PMC faction OR become honored with the PMC as Outis Background.
description.russian: Завершите обучение и выберите «Проксиму» ИЛИ заслужите уважение «Проксимы» с предысторией «Никто».
description.brazilian: Complete o tutorial e escolha a facção do Sindicato OU torne-se honrado com o Sindicato e Histórico Outis.

description.english: Sell over 20k of trade goods in a single sale, while honored with the Syndicate and PMC, as Trader or Miner background.
description.russian: Продайте товаров на сумму более 20 000 кредитов одной транзакцией («Продать всё»), заслужив уважение Синдиката И «Проксимы» с предысторией «Торговец» или «Шахтёр».
description.brazilian: Venda mais de 20 mil de mercadorias comerciais em uma única venda, enquanto honrado com o Sindicato e PMC, e Histórico de Comerciante ou Mineiro.

description.english: Complete the independent quest "Old friends, new enemies" and choose 'Lone Wolf' at the end.
description.russian: Достигните 30 ур. с предысторией «Никто».
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 30 enquanto seu Histórico for Outis.

description.english: Complete the tutorial and choose the Red Skull faction OR become honored with the Red Skull as Outis, Miner or Trader Background.
description.russian: Заслужите уважение Красного Черепа с предысторией «Никто», «Торговец» или «Шахтёр».
description.brazilian: Torne-se honrado com os Caveiras Vermelha com Histórico Outis, Mineiro ou Comerciante.

description.english: Become honored with the Children of Terra as Outis, Miner or Trader Background AND complete the quest 'Enlist'.
description.russian: Заслужите уважение Детей Терры с предысторией «Никто», «Торговец» или «Шахтёр» И завершите задание «Запишитесь».
description.brazilian: Torne-se honrado com os Filhos da Terra com Histórico Outis, Mineiro ou Comerciante, e complete a missão 'Alistamento'.

description.english: Defeat any Ravager Boss before reaching level 10.
description.russian: Победите любого босса-опустошителя, не достигнув 10 ур.
description.brazilian: Derrote qualquer Ravager Boss antes de atingir o nível 10.

description.english: Defeat an elite (silver star) enemy, that has a ship at least 2 sizes bigger and is at least 2 levels higher than you, without assistance.
description.russian: Без чьей-либо помощи победите элитного (серебряная звезда) врага с кораблём как минимум на 2 размера больше и как минимум на 2 уровня выше вас.
description.brazilian: Derrote um inimigo elite (estrela de prata), que seja pelo menos 2 níveis acima de você, tanto em tamanho de nave quanto em level, sem assistência.

description.english: Destroy an Independent, Syndicate or PMC space station.
description.russian: Уничтожьте космическую станцию Синдиката, «Проксимы» или независимой стороны.
description.brazilian: Destrua uma estação espacial Independente, do Sindicato ou PMC.

description.english: 6 times, cause a space station to become hostile, then retreat.
description.russian: 6 раз спровоцируйте космическую станцию на агрессию, а затем отступите.
description.brazilian: 6 vezes, faça com que uma estação espacial se torne hostil e depois recue.

description.english: Destroy a Venghi space station.
description.russian: Уничтожьте космическую станцию венгов.
description.brazilian: Destruir uma estação espacial Venghi.

description.english: Destroy a CoT space station.
description.russian: Уничтожьте космическую станцию Детей Терры.
description.brazilian: Destrua uma estação espacial CoT.

description.english: Attack and destroy 20 Civilian, Syndicate and/or PMC ships.
description.russian: Атакуйте и уничтожьте 20 кораблей Синдиката, «Проксимы» и/или гражданских.
description.brazilian: Ataque e destrua 20 nave civis, do sindicato e/ou PMC.

description.english: Retreat from 10 combats with Civilian, Syndicate and/or PMC ships without damaging them.
description.russian: Отступите из 10 схваток с кораблями Синдиката, «Проксимы» и/или гражданских, не нанеся им урона.
description.brazilian: Recue de 10 combates com nave civis, sindicato e/ou PMC sem danificá-los.

description.english: Save 10 Civilian, Syndicate and/or PMC ships from pirate attacks.
description.russian: Защитите 10 кораблей Синдиката, «Проксимы» и/или гражданских от нападения пиратов.
description.brazilian: Salve 10 nave civis, do sindicato e/ou PMC de ataques de piratas.

description.english: Explore 100 Sectors.
description.russian: Разведайте 100 секторов.
description.brazilian: Explore 100 Setores.

description.english: Reach level 50.
description.russian: Достигните 50 ур.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 50.

description.english: Become honored with the Venghi as Outis, Miner or Trader Background.
description.russian: Заслужите уважение венгов с предысторией «Никто», «Торговец» или «Шахтёр».
description.brazilian: Torne-se honrado com os Venghi tendo Histórico Outis, Mineiro ou Comerciante.

description.english: Fully explore a large Nebula sector.
description.russian: Полностью разведайте большой сектор туманности.
description.brazilian: Explore completamente um setor grande de Nebulosa.

description.english: Obtain 4 different metals from a single asteroid (basic ore doesn't count).
description.russian: Добудьте 4 разных металла из одного астероида (простая руда не в счёт).
description.brazilian: Obtenha 4 metais diferentes de um único asteróide (o minério básico não conta).

description.english: Mine Iridium.
description.russian: Добудьте иридий.
description.brazilian: Minere irídio.

description.english: Fully explore 10 sectors.
description.russian: Полностью разведайте 10 секторов.
description.brazilian: Explore completamente 10 setores.

description.english: Destroy a higher level enemy that has full armor and a bigger ship than yours, within 3 seconds after emerging from cloak. Do it 5 times.
description.russian: Уничтожьте врага более высокого уровня с полной бронёй и с большим кораблём в течение 3 секунд после выхода из маскировки. Сделайте это 5 раз.
description.brazilian: Destrua um inimigo de nível superior que tenha pontos de vida completo e uma nave maior que a sua, dentro de 3 segundos após emergir da camuflagem. Faça isso 5 vezes.

description.english: Destroy 100 ships your level or higher, up to Corvette size, flying a Corvette or smaller ship.
description.russian: Пилотируя корвет или меньший корабль, уничтожьте 100 кораблей вашего уровня или выше, размером вплоть до корвета.
description.brazilian: Destrua 100 nave do seu nível ou superior, até o tamanho de Corvette, pilotando um Corvette ou uma nave menor.

description.english: Escape from an Asteroid Rush alive.
description.russian: Выживите в астероидном потоке.
description.brazilian: Escape de um Asteroid Rush vivo.

description.english: Defeat 10 enemy ships.
description.russian: Победите 10 вражеских кораблей.
description.brazilian: Derrote 10 nave inimigos.

description.english: Defeat an attack fleet your level or higher, doing more than 80% of total damage.
description.russian: Победите атакующий флот вашего уровня или выше, нанеся более 80% всего урона врагу.
description.brazilian: Derrote uma frota de ataque do seu nível ou superior, causando mais de 80% do dano total.

description.english: Help defend a station against an attack fleet your level or higher, doing more than 10% of total damage.
description.russian: Помогите защитить станцию от атакующего флота вашего уровня или выше, нанеся более 10% всего урона врагу.
description.brazilian: Ajude a defender uma estação contra uma frota de ataque de seu nível ou superior, causando mais de 10% do dano total.

description.english: Help an attack fleet defeat a station your level or higher, doing more than 10% of total damage.
description.russian: Помогите атакующему флоту победить станцию вашего уровня или выше, нанеся более 10% всего урона врагу.
description.brazilian: Ajude uma frota de ataque a derrotar uma estação do seu nível ou superior, causando mais de 10% do dano total.

description.english: Defeat 5 Ravager Bosses your level or higher, using a yacht or shuttle.
description.russian: Победите 5 боссов-опустошителей вашего или более высокого уровня при помощи катера или яхты.
description.brazilian: Derrote 5 Ravager Bosses do seu nível ou superior, usando um iate ou shuttle.

description.english: Have a crew member evolve to Legendary rarity.
description.russian: Развить члена экипажа до легендарного ранга.
description.brazilian: Faça um tripulante evoluir para raridade lendária.

description.english: Clear 10 Asteroid Fields
description.russian: Очистите 10 полей астероидов.
description.brazilian: Limpe 10 campos de asteroides

description.english: Destroy 200 units of Junk
description.russian: Уничтожьте 200 ед. мусора.
description.brazilian: Destrua 200 unidades de sucata

description.english: Have 40 different item stacks in your ship inventory, while flying a Shuttle or Yacht.
description.russian: Иметь 40 различных стопок предметов в своём трюме, пилотируя катер или яхту.
description.brazilian: Tenha 40 pilhas de itens diferentes em seu inventário da nave, enquanto pilota um ônibus espacial ou iate.

description.english: Reach Space Pilot 25 before having 25 in any other knowledge.
description.russian: Достигнуть космического пилота 25 раньше других знаний.
description.brazilian: Alcance Piloto Espacial 25 antes de ter 25 em qualquer outro conhecimento.

description.english: Reach Fleet Commander 25 before having 25 in any other knowledge.
description.russian: Достигнуть командира флота 25 раньше других знаний.
description.brazilian: Alcance Comandante de Frota 25 antes de ter 25 em qualquer outro conhecimento.

description.english: Reach Geology 25 before having 25 in any other knowledge.
description.russian: Достигнуть геологии 25 раньше других знаний.
description.brazilian: Alcance 25 em Geologia antes de ter 25 em qualquer outro conhecimento.

description.english: Reach Tech Level 25 before having 25 in any other knowledge.
description.russian: Достигнуть техно-уровня 25 раньше других знаний.
description.brazilian: Alcance Nível Tecnológico 25 antes de ter 25 em qualquer outro conhecimento.

description.english: Reach 25 in Explorer before having 25 in any other knowledge.
description.russian: Достигнуть разведчика 25 раньше других знаний.
description.brazilian: Alcance Explorador 25 antes de ter 25 em qualquer outro conhecimento.

description.english: Reach level 10 without buying any equipment or ship, while having no faction beyond neutral reputation.
description.russian: Достигните 10 ур., ни разу не купив оборудование или корабль и имея лишь нейтральную репутацию у фракций.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 10 sem comprar nenhum equipamento ou nave, enquanto não tiver facção além da reputação neutra.

description.english: Complete the independent quest "Old friends, new enemies" and choose 'Scoundrel' at the end.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão independente "Velhos amigos, novos inimigos" e escolha 'Canalha' no final.

description.english: Complete the independent quest "Old friends, new enemies".
description.brazilian: Conclua a missão independente "Velhos amigos, novos inimigos".

description.english: Reach 25 in Construction before having 25 in any other knowledge.
description.brazilian: Alcance 25 em Construção antes de ter 25 em qualquer outro conhecimento.

description.english: Have a station reach over 1 million credits in  revenue.
Survive 20 enemy assaults on your base.
